title: Product Customization

objective.as_a: user who selected an art style
objective.i_want: to customize print size, paper type, and frame options
objective.so_that: I can create a personalized product

acceptance_criteria.description: Display size options (A2, A3, A4, A5) with prices in ILS
Display paper type options (Fine Art Matte, Glossy Photo, Canvas Texture)
Display frame options (oak, white, black, none) with prices
Real-time price calculation as options change
Preview updates to show selected frame
Continue to checkout button with total price

notes: UI is complete and polished. No changes needed.
